abstract: Federal Judge Emmet G Sullivan throws out main section of Interior Department rule on global warming’s threat to polar bears.
snippet: A federal judge has thrown out a main section of an Interior Department rule on global warming’s threat to polar bears.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge has thrown out a main section of an Interior Department rule on global warming’s threat to polar bears.

headline.main: Judge Orders Review on Polar Bears
headline.print_headline: Judge Orders Review on Polar Bears
headline.seo: Judge Orders Review on Polar Bears
